# Getting Started

`nanopub` is a toolkit to sign and publish [Nanopublications](https://nanopub.net).


## Usage

```rust
use std::fs;
use nanopub::Nanopub;
let public_key = r#""#;
let private_key = r#""#;

let np_rdf = fs::read_to_string("./tests/resources/simple1-rsa.trig").unwrap();

let np = Nanopub::sign(
    np_rdf.as_str(),
    private_key,
    "https://orcid.org/0000-0000-0000-0000",
);
```
